it.polimi.se2019.server.model

Class LootCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.model.LootCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Grabbable, Jsonable

    public class LootCard
extends Object
implements Grabbable, Drawable, Jsonable
    This class defines loot cards, which can be grabbed on loot tiles. Loot cards are named following this pattern: first letter of the top ammo colour / P when it is a power up + first letter of the bottom left ammo colour + first letter of the bottom right ammo colour.
